Uses of Package
dbms.exececution

Packages that use dbms.exececution
dbms   
dbms.util   
 

Classes in dbms.exececution used by dbms
ExececutionMachine
          This class implements a typical execution machine that executes the queries.
 

Classes in dbms.exececution used by dbms.util
EnormousCharacterException
          This exception is thrown whenever we try to insert in the database a string which is more than 50 characters long.
EnormousRecordException
          This exception is thrown whenever we try to create a record which exceeds Main.Page_Size, the limit we have set of a page size, typically, at 512 bytes.
InvalidPrimaryKeyException
          This exception is thrown whenever we try to create a table and try to set the Primary Key of a column that does not exist in the table.
